character_width.description: How many characters it takes before it line breaks it.

newline_limit.description: The limit of newlines between statements and declarations.

tabs_width.description: How many characters one tab represents

convert_do.description: Convert all do statements to brace blocks

exp_multiline_composite_literals.description: Experimental: Composite literals that span multiple lines are not forcibly inlined

inline_single_stmt_case.description: When statement in the clause contains one simple statement, it will inline the case and statement in one line

spaces_around_colons.description: Put a space on both sides of a single colon during variable/field declaration, such as `foo : bar`

space_single_line_blocks.description: Put spaces around braces of single-line blocks: `{return 0}` => `{ return 0 }`
